name: utfx
author: Daniel Wirtz <dcode@dcode.io>
description: A compact library to process, convert, encode and decode UTF8 / UTF16 in JavaScript using arbitrary sources and destinations through the use of callbacks.

scripts.build: node node_modules/metascript/bin/metascript src/utfx.js > dist/utfx.js && node node_modules/metascript/bin/metascript src/lib.js > dist/utfx.embeddable.js
scripts.make: npm run-script build && npm run-script compile && npm test
